name: azure-maps
description: AzureMap module displays a map and pinpoints locations that it subscribes to. This module is powered by Azure Maps, which has some geographical restrictions. Please refer to the documentation for more details. Additionally, you may want to communicate these restrictions to your customers via adding an additional Text Box with the relevant links as applicable.

pushpinOptions.description: Provide additional data to create customized pushpin

color.description: Specifies color of pushpin. Any color code including hex is supported

selectionColor.description: Specifies color of selected pushpin. Any color code including hex is supported

showIndex.description: Specifies whether or not to show numbers on the pushpin

className.description: Provide a custom css class name defined in the theme pack to target the CSS for this module

clientRender.description: Enabling this property will cause the module to load its Javascript chunk and render on the client based on the user view port. This property is recommended for modules which are generally hidden below the users view port (lower on the page) to increase page load performance.
